keyword: how many calories in filet mignon
title: How Many Calories in Filet Mignon?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in filet mignon for a standard 3-oz serving, plus protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition details with preparation tweaks.
h1: How Many Calories in Filet Mignon?
assumptions: 3-oz (85 g) serving, lean only, broiled or grilled, trimmed of visible fat, no added oil, butter, or sauce.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, grade (choice/prime), cooking method, and portion size. Check labels or use a food scale for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One 3-oz filet mignon provides ~155 kcal and ~24 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a 3-oz filet mignon?
faqs.a: About 155 kcal for lean, broiled filet mignon.

faqs.q: What's the protein in filet mignon?

faqs.a: No carbs, fiber, or sugarsâ€”it's nearly all protein and fat.

faqs.q: How does cooking affect calories in filet mignon?
faqs.a: Broiling or grilling keeps it lean; frying or adding fats increases calories by 40+ kcal.
Yes, ~6 g total fat per 3-oz serving, mostly unsaturated when lean.
